name: @symbux/turbo-starter
description: A starter project/boilerplate for the turbo engine using Vue 3.
author: Symbux Dev <hello@symbux.dev> (https://symbux.dev)

scripts.setup: cd ./api && yarn install && cd ../web && yarn install
scripts.build: cd ./api && yarn build && cd ../web && yarn build
scripts.dev: cd ./api && yarn dev & cd ./web && yarn dev
